description: Unique integer representation of each row in the dataset
String representing the brand/manufacturer of the vehicle (e.g. `Ford`). Brands are a super set of Models. Models are not guaranteed to be unique to a single brand.
Specific model of the car (e.g. `Mustang`). Models always belong to a brand.
Year that instance of the car was produced
Total distance the car has been driven (in miles)
Type of fuel the car uses (e.g., `Gasoline`, `E85 Flex Fuel`)
Engine specifications (e.g., "172.0HP 1.6L 4 Cylinder Engine Gasoline Fuel")
Transmission type (e.g., A/T for Automatic Transmission)
Exterior color of the car. Colors are specifically "Base Colors" such as `Silver`, `Black`, `Red`, rather than their manufacturer name
Interior color of the car. Colors are specifically "Base Colors" such as `Silver`, `Black`, `Red`, rather than their manufacturer name
Accident history of the car. Description includes if an accident or damage has been reported, and if so, how many have been
"yes"/"no" or "true"/"false" indicating if the car has a clean title
Price of the car in whole currency units (e.g., USD)
